message.text: | PLUM* will restart in roughly #tmin minutes. Stay down for the come up.
| In Remembrance of Taylor Feick aka MindFr34k - From Volsung, The Union, The Black Code, and The NETWORk* | R.I.P Grits'N'Scrill
|| With gratitude extended to all of our Premium Supporters + all who help projects like ours stay in operation.
| Server Feedback can be submitted on our Discord for community vote.
|| For any questions or concerns regarding PLUM*, contact TR or RxmYxm via Discord.
| PLUM* Staff do not have access to log damage, placement, basebuilding, playerlist.
| https://discord.gg/sUacYXp | The DayZ NETWORk* on Discord | 1st.Gen Survivors of the DayZ on Xbox Community | Est.Feb.16th.2019
|| Join our Discord to register or join a Faction, view Killfeed, Leaderboard progress and access exclusive services and content.
|| Interactions are encouraged, but may cost your life.
| Player spawn points are set to Chernogorsk.
|| Welcome to PLUM* hosted by The DayZ NETWORk*, v1.24.
